import React from 'react' import { selectFolderOpen, setFolderOpen } from '../Redux/appSlice' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import "./Taskbar.sass" import { RiFolder2Fill, RiFirefoxFill, RiBrushFill, RiBookletFill } from "react-icons/ri"; import { ImSpotify } from 'react-icons/im'; function Taskbar() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const folderOpen = useSelector(selectFolderOpen); return (
{ dispatch(setFolderOpen({ folderOpen: !folderOpen })) }} />
) } export default Taskbar
